description.displayText:
Michelle is our super-nanny! As soon as you meet her you'll know why. We have two young children. Michelle originally nannied our eldest when he was between 1 and 2 years.  Since then, we've grabbed her whenever we can for babysitting him (now 4) and our youngest child (now 2). (She moved to Germany, DC, and now CA or we never would have let her go!)

Michelle is full of positive energy, genuinely cares for and listens to our kids, and is just a fun person to be around. We took her traveling with us. She is just like family. I just can't say enough positive things about her and recommend her enthusiastically.

description.displayText: I interviewed Michelle for an emergency full-time childcare need.  Michelle was thoughtful and kind about the situation that prompted our need for help, as was she smart, friendly, courteous, and flexible.  We ended up hiring someone else due to geography, but I would certainly call Michelle for babysitting needs.  Due to our interaction, though admittedly brief, I recommend that you give Michelle a call!
